  • Constructor Details

    • PipeManager

      public PipeManager(CommandHandler commandHandler, int maxX, int minX, double width, double gapHeight, double initialSpeed, int bottom, int period, double acceleration)
      Basic Constructor.
      Parameters:
      commandHandler - a command handler to handle addition and removal of pipes.
      maxX - The maximum x coordinate of a pipe pair created. This is where each pipe pair will be initialized.
      minX - The minimum x coordinate of a pipe pair created. This is where each pipe pair will be deleted.
      width - Width of the pipes.
      gapHeight - Height of each gap.
      initialSpeed - Initial speed of the pipes.
      bottom - The y coordinate of the bottom of the screen.
      period - How many frames between each creation of PipePairs.
      acceleration - The rate of acceleration of the pipes speed. Note: should be around 0.001.

    • pop

      public void pop()
      check if the leftmost pipe is past the endX. If so, remove it.

      Parameters:

    • getClosestRight

      public PipePair getClosestRight(double x)
      Find the closest PipePair to the right of a given x coordinate WARNING: returns reference to actual PipePair, do not change.
      Parameters:
      x - the given x coordinate
      Returns:
      The found PipePair
